en.required_if: The :field1 field is required when :field2 is :value2.
en.required_with: The :field1 field is required when :field2 is present.
en.required_without: The :field1 field is required when :field2 is not present.
en.min: The :field field must be at least :value.
en.max: The :field field may not be greater than :value.
en.size: The :field field must be of size :value.
en.same: The :field1 field must match the :field2 field.
en.different: The :field1 field must be different from the :field2 field.
en.between: The :field1 field must be between :field2 and :value2.
en.regexp: The :field field does not match the required format :value.
en.email: The :field field must be a valid email address.

ar.min: :field يجب أن يكون الحقل على الأقل :value.
ar.different: :field1 يجب أن يكون الحقل مختلفاً عن :field2.
ar.between: :field1 يجب أن يكون الحقل بين :field2 و :value2.
ar.regexp: :field الحقل لا يتطابق مع الصيغة المطلوبة :value.
ar.email: :field يجب أن يكون الحقل عنوان بريد إلكتروني صالح.
